name: Lantern Bearer (MoonByte)
description:
A young man, forced to decide between letting his brother die or serving a mysterious creature of the woods. What will he choose? Will he choose...at all?

(May contain spoilers about the TV series "Over The Garden Wall")

This game was created in 17 hours as part of the Global Game Jam 2015 (in Cologne, Germany). Everything was done by me, except for the music by Kevin McLeod and three illustrations from the original series.
